name: logpilot
description: Real time command runner and log viewer. Useful for development.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && pnpm run build:ui && tsx scripts/build.ts
scripts.build:ui: cp src/index.html dist/index.html && bun build ./src/ui.tsx --outdir ./dist && bun build ./src/clientWorker.ts --outdir ./dist
scripts.dev:1:cleanup: bunx kill-port 8945 51515; rm -rf dist; mkdir dist
scripts.dev:piped: dev:init && bun test/test-script.mjs | bun --watch src/nodeCli.ts -s secret
